train.title: What is the capital of France?
train.processed_text: The capital of France is Paris.

train.title: Explain Newton's first law.
train.processed_text: Newton's first law states that an object will remain at rest or in uniform motion unless acted upon by a force.

validation.title: What is the tallest mountain on Earth?
validation.processed_text: The tallest mountain on Earth is Mount Everest.

validation.title: Describe the process of photosynthesis.
validation.processed_text: Photosynthesis is the process by which green plants use sunlight to synthesize food from carbon dioxide and water.
